title: How Fauci Stole Christmas | Guest Host: Justin Barclay | Guest: Adam Davis, Tammy Clark, Kristen Meghan, & Kay Smyth | 12/24/21
description:
Radio host Justin Barclay guest host the Glenn Beck Program. The Kim Potter verdict is in, Barclay shares his thoughts on the case, and how it relates to the state of the country today. Is a 110-year sentence for a Colorado truck driver too harsh? Author Adam Davis joins the show to discuss the rising crime in America and the dangers of liberal ideology. Is Fauci trying to steal Christmas again, and is the fourth booster on the way? Infectious disease experts Tammy Clark and Kristen Meghan join the show to speak the truth on the OSHA mandates, and personal protection. Then, reporter Kay Smythe joins the show and discusses new COVID legislation going on in New York and all around the country. Justin then shares a couple of feel-good stories to bring in the holiday cheer.
